description: Dept. of Elections - Elected Mr. Vimala Senage Dharsana Prasad Vimalasana as Vice Chairman and Mr. Gunathilage Ariyawansa as member of the Vavunia South Sinhala Pradeshiya Sabha - Elected Mr. Athapaththu M. K .B. as a member of the Mawathagama Pradeshiya Sabha - Elected Mr. K. A. Wasantha Wijaya Bandara as a member of the Wariyapola Pradeshiya Sabha - Elected Mr. Wagapedigedara Ajith Thusara Piyadasa as a member of the Yatinuwara Pradeshiya Sabha.
